instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00426: What is 820-00426? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fast fan GPU DIE 2
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with no drop or liquid damage. The fans start spinning fast and the system runs slow within a few minutes running. Running HW monitor the only unusual temp is GPU DIE 2 at 129C.

Also ran ASD and said there may be a problem with the power management system. What should be checked to solve this? Battery is in good condition.

What should be checked next?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00426</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fast fan GPU DIE 2
threads.message:
You should try another known good battery.
Also test with another trackpad flex/board.
Just in case, disconnect webcam and see if symptom changes.
